item.description:
YOU MUST BE SINGLE AND LOOKING TO ATTEND THIS EVENT!

Put your dancing shoes on and join me for a Salsa Singles event at Fred Estaire Studios in Orange!

YOU MUST REGISTER IN ADVANCE!

Price $20
PRE-REGISTERBY FEB. 3RD
AND SAVE $5
Call 203-795-5200

Meet me at the Fred Estaire Studios in Orange on Thursday February 9 at 7:45. Included in the cost of the event is 2 free 1/2 hour Salsa Dance lessons!

There will be singles attending from outside the Meetup community, so there will be lots of new people to meet!

Fred Estaire Dance Studios

547 Boston Post Road

Orange, CT 06477

www.FADSOrange.com
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me at the entrance. I'll distribute my Cell phone number in advance in case you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Singles Salsa & Sangria Night
